channel.title: I added highscores and got 1 problem
channel.description:
I used http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html tut and it works. But when I click on a player on highscores it say: Personal stats for NAME Unknown column 'Runftxp' in 'order clause'
Someone know how to fix this? I will rep. You can check by yourself herE: http://65.75.243.239/highscores
I'm not adver because you can't see a server ip or someting

item.title: I added highscores and got 1 problem
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

Yes but that doesn’t tell me how to fix.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2009, 12:36:30 pm[/size][hr]no1 know?

Read full topic
item.source: I added highscores and got 1 problem

item.title: I added highscores and got 1 problem
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Google the error, but take out the column name. This is what I found in the first link:
Looks like your ./includes/database.mysql.inc is trying to access a field called “name” from the menu table, which as you can tell, does not exist.

Read full topic
item.source: I added highscores and got 1 problem
